column1: Did Las Vegas gunman target other music festivals?
column3: In the days and months before he mowed down concertgoers from his high-rise hotel suite, gunman Stephen Paddock rented rooms overlooking two other music festivals in Las Vegas and Chicago, authorities said.

column1: Nike brings Chinese P.E. teachers to Beaverton Elementary School
column3: Nike is hosting some of the most innovative physical education (P.E.) teachers from China this week.

column1: Trump Justice Dept ends transgender workplace protections
